status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.section: The following protocol was written for HeLa cells but can be adapted to many other standard mammalian cell lines.
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8g5mm","text":"Remove 1x PBS, trypsin, and media (DMEM+10%FBS+1%pen/strep supplement (Gibco) from the fridge and warm it up in a   water bath for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":114,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":131,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

steps.section: The following protocol was written for HeLa cells but can be adapted to many other standard mammalian cell lines.
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3jake","text":"Remove containers from water bath and disinfect with 70% EtOH before placing in cell culture hood.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: The following protocol was written for HeLa cells but can be adapted to many other standard mammalian cell lines.
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"b5tlc","text":"Take the existing cells in the  2 cell culture flask in the incubator and place under hood after observing under microscope to ensure that cells are near confluent.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":32,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":31,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"75","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1715}}}}

steps.section: The following protocol was written for HeLa cells but can be adapted to many other standard mammalian cell lines.
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7ah43","text":"Attach a sterile Pasteur pipette to the vacuum tube so that the media can be aspirated from the flask by tilting the container so that the media is at front facing left corner where the pipette tip is. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: The following protocol was written for HeLa cells but can be adapted to many other standard mammalian cell lines.
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3501b","text":"Wash cells with   of PBS added to the bottom most surface away from the cells then place flask down horizontally and gently move side to side to rinse the cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":16,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

steps.section: The following protocol was written for HeLa cells but can be adapted to many other standard mammalian cell lines.
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cf81d","text":"Aspirate again.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: The following protocol was written for HeLa cells but can be adapted to many other standard mammalian cell lines.
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ej6cd","text":"Add   of pre-warmed trypsin to cover the cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

steps.section: The following protocol was written for HeLa cells but can be adapted to many other standard mammalian cell lines.
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"66o32","text":"Incubate for   or until the cells have released from the flask.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":13,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

steps.section: The following protocol was written for HeLa cells but can be adapted to many other standard mammalian cell lines.
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"a8ud7","text":"Add   of fresh media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

steps.section: The following protocol was written for HeLa cells but can be adapted to many other standard mammalian cell lines.
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"d8v3g","text":"Collect cell suspension from the flask and wash the side possessing the cells several times before transferring solution to 15 ml conical tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: The following protocol was written for HeLa cells but can be adapted to many other standard mammalian cell lines.
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"e328h","text":"Centrifuge the conical tube for 2.5 minutes at  .  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":47,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"100","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":34}}}}

steps.section: The following protocol was written for HeLa cells but can be adapted to many other standard mammalian cell lines.
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cq428","text":"Aspirate to leave behind just the cell pellet and a little bit of media to cover the cell pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: The following protocol was written for HeLa cells but can be adapted to many other standard mammalian cell lines.
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2a8kb","text":"Resuspend in   of media and pipette up and down to disperse cell clumps. Avoid the formation of bubbles.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":13,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

steps.section: The following protocol was written for HeLa cells but can be adapted to many other standard mammalian cell lines.
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3rck1","text":"Obtain a new flask and place   of fresh media into it and before transferring   (1:10) of the cell suspension into it. Or alternatively distribute the desired number of cells (counted with hemocytometer or other cell counting device) to the appropriate cell culture dish/flask for downstream experiments.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":29,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":78,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"12","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}
